description: Manage credentials for App Configuration stores.

commands.name: az appconfig credential list
commands.summary: List access keys of an App Configuration store.
examples: az appconfig credential list -g MyResourceGroup -n MyAppConfiguration

commands.name: az appconfig credential regenerate
commands.summary: Regenerate an access key for an App Configuration store.
examples: az appconfig credential regenerate -g MyResourceGroup -n MyAppConfiguration --id 0-l0-s0:8ldbreMVH+d7EjaSUg3H
